titleStmt.title: A dialogue between Anthony Earl of Shaftsbury, and Captain Thomas Walcott, upon their meeting in Pluto's kingdome.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by W.D. and are to be sold by W. Davis in Amen-Corner,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Curs'd be those eyes that sees him".
